channel.title: We need old noble back
channel.description:
I mean the one with private matter, maid spy, and order,
My most fun games I have ever played on ToL were with that noble. I felt as though i was a member of an underground movement, taking a look behind the curtain to see how the trials happen.
I worked with prince and investigators to communicate silently and kill unseen/cult at night.
New noble? Terrible. I kind of liked royal decree and order when infinite uses, but now they are bad.....
Please, bring back the private mattering maid spying noble.

item.title: We need old noble back
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
I miss the neighborhood Nobles. I’d just take away their night immunity and suicide mechanic.

What if the new Noble met with the King in chat every night? Like a King’s advisor.

Read full topic

item.title: We need old noble back
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Nah new Noble is good, it just needs to be better at its job and a new Social that’s close in feel to old Noble needs to be here

Read full topic
